headline: Skillsoft Slips 72% in a Year: How Should Investors Play the Stock?
summary: SKIL plunges 72% in a year, but a possible Global Knowledge sale, AI-led Percipio wins and a cheap valuation may reshape the story.

headline: Jim Cramer Says He “Can’t Name a Single Competitor to AppLovin”
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 stocks Jim Cramer commented on. Cramer discussed the company’s valuation, along with current growth and future growth expectations, as he commented: “The eighth-best stock in the Nasdaq-100 was AppLovin. headline: AppLovin (APP) Is Down 6.1% After Selling Gaming Unit To Double Down On AI Ads
summary: In recent months, AppLovin has sharpened its focus on AI-powered advertising by selling its mobile gaming unit for US$900 million and expanding into areas such as e-commerce, fintech, and automotive ads, while preparing to report its 2025 results in February 2026. At the same time, the company’s heightened exposure to regulatory scrutiny over data-collection practices and shifting investor sentiment has turned its AI-led repositioning and Axon Ads Manager rollout into key tests of how...
